column4: Gnome session works fine for root, but I have ruined it for my normal user... can't login to failsafe gnome session either. Is there a way to fix?
Is there a command to make gnome re-create default config files for a user?
Well, I think I did, and now I can't log in.. I get the message that the session lasted les than 10 seconds, and there is a log file... butthe log file is empty!
well it depends on your computer usage, and then their is the obvious,  better security,  very stable, etc
